src: In general I really like the interplay between the two games. The advantage of shortform stories is that you can "skip to the good part", they can be more immediately engrossing and satisfying. The advantage of longform stories is that you can imbue whatever happens with way more emotional weight, you lose the immediacy in exchange for stronger payoffs.
tgt: En general, me gusta mucho la interacción entre los dos juegos. La ventaja de las historias cortas es que puedes "saltar a la parte buena", pueden ser más inmediatamente absorbentes y satisfactorias. La ventaja de las historias largas es que puedes infundirle un peso emocional mucho mayor a lo que sucede, pierdes la inmediatez a cambio de recompensas más fuertes.

src: In 2019, Ukraine adopted a law that makes using the Ukrainian language obligatory in all spheres of public life, including government, medicine, science, education, and the media. Failure to comply can result in fines. Since 2022, when the military conflict with Russia began, Ukraine has undertaken a campaign of total de-Russification, with MPs saying it is necessary in order to defend against Russian influence. Local authorities have introduced complete bans on Russian-language works of art, performances, books, films, songs, and its study in schools and universities, and recommended that schoolchildren communicate in Ukrainian even during breaks.
tgt: 乌克兰在2019年通过了一项法律，要求在所有公共领域使用乌克兰语，包括政府、医疗、科学、教育和媒体等领域。未遵守法律的后果是罚款。自2022年俄乌军事冲突开始以来，乌克兰一直在进行彻底的去俄化行动，议员表示这是为了抵御俄罗斯的影响。地方当局已全面禁止使用俄语的艺术作品、表演、书籍、电影、歌曲、以及在学校和大学中学习俄语，并建议学生在休息时间也使用乌克兰语交流。

src: "Importantly, today's Commission action is cabined to ETPs holding one non-security commodity, bitcoin. It should in no way signal the Commission's willingness to approve listing standards for crypto asset securities. Nor does the approval signal anything about the Commission's views as to the status of other crypto assets under the federal securities laws or about the current state of non-compliance of certain crypto asset market participants with the federal securities laws," Gensler said.
tgt: "Es importante destacar que la acción de la Comisión de hoy se limita a los ETP que poseen un solo producto básico no financiero, bitcoin. De ninguna manera debe interpretarse como una señal de la disposición de la Comisión para aprobar estándares de listado para valores de activos criptográficos. Tampoco la aprobación indica nada sobre la opinión de la Comisión respecto al estatus de otros activos criptográficos bajo las leyes de valores federales o sobre el actual estado de incumplimiento de ciertos participantes en el mercado de activos criptográficos con las leyes de valores federales", dijo Gensler.

src: Our planning system also needs to adapt so that planners in suburban councils, who seem to be less supportive of change, are not the only determinants of the future shape of their suburbs. A way forward could be to have an independent decision-making body that championed quality design as long as it fitted below the tree tops and incorporated family living, large balconies, common gardens and presented a friendly appearance. This could be a role for the current NSW government architect working within a carefully crafted complying code.
tgt: Nuestro sistema de planeamiento también debe adaptarse para que los planificadores de los municipios suburbanos (que parecen menos dispuestos al cambio) no sean los únicos en determinar la forma que tomarán sus suburbios en el futuro. Una forma de seguir adelante podría ser contar con un organismo independiente de toma de decisiones que defendiera un diseño de calidad, siempre que cupiera por debajo de las copas de los árboles e incorporara la vida en familia, así como amplios balcones, jardines comunitarios, y presentara un aspecto amable. Este podría ser un papel para el actual arquitecto del Gobierno de Nueva Gales del Sur, trabajando dentro de los márgenes de un código de cumplimiento cuidadosamente elaborado.

src: Speaking on behalf of Edu, Rasheed Zubair, her media aide, asserts that the act is legal within the framework of the Nigerian civil service. However, it is crucial to note that the request violates various sections of Nigeria's Financial Regulations 2009, which explicitly prohibit fraud and other forms of corruption in government business. Additionally, Chapter Seven, Section 713 of Nigeria's Financial Regulations 2009 explicitly states, "Personal money shall in no circumstances be paid into a government bank account, nor shall any public money be paid into a private account." It further stipulates, "Any officer who pays public money into a private account is deemed to have done so with fraudulent intention."
tgt: 埃杜的媒体助手拉希德·祖拜尔（Rasheed Zubair）代表埃杜发言，断言该行为在尼日利亚公务员法框架内是合法的。然而，需要注意的是，该请求违反了尼日利亚2009年财务条例的多个条款，该条例明确禁止政府业务中的欺诈和其他形式的腐败。此外，尼日利亚2009年财务条例第七章第713节明确规定，“个人资金不得在任何情况下支付到政府银行账户，也不得将任何公共资金支付到私人账户。”该条款进一步规定，“任何官员将公共资金支付到私人账户，shall be deemed to have done so with fraudulent intention。”

src: The problems at the EPA are distinct but not unrelated to those at the Department of Justice, which handles environmental crimes via its Environment and Natural Resources Division, or ENRD. Prior to joining the EPA, Uhlmann - the EPA assistant secretary for enforcement - had served as the longtime head of that division's Environmental Crimes Section, from 1990 through 2007. The EPA sends its most serious civil and criminal cases to ENRD, which - as a relatively underfunded office - often relies on other agencies in helping to choose which fights to take on. In fiscal year 2022, the EPA deferred fewer cases to DOJ (88) than at any point since 2000 and concluded fewer civil judicial cases than it had since that time, as well. As the Environmental Integrity Project notes, even Trump's EPA concluded 94 civil cases and deferred 106 cases per year to the DOJ per year, on average.
tgt: Los problemas en la EPA son distintos pero no están desvinculados de los del Departamento de Justicia, que maneja los delitos ambientales a través de su División de Medio Ambiente y Recursos Naturales, o ENRD. Antes de unirse a la EPA, Uhlmann - el subsecretario de aplicación de la ley de la EPA - había sido durante mucho tiempo el jefe de la Sección de Delitos Ambientales de esa división, desde 1990 hasta 2007. La EPA envía sus casos civiles y penales más graves a la ENRD, que - como oficina relativamente poco financiada - a menudo depende de otras agencias para ayudar a elegir qué batallas librar. En el año fiscal 2022, la EPA remitió menos casos al DOJ (88) que en cualquier otro momento desde 2000 y concluyó menos casos judiciales civiles que desde entonces, también. Como señala el Proyecto de Integridad Ambiental, incluso la EPA de Trump concluyó 94 casos civiles y remitió 106 casos por año al DOJ en promedio.

src: Sasebo Festival is a biannual, cultural, political, and artistic event forum conference that brings together quite a lot of different formats. So we have quite a bit of experience at the same time, it's an event that is nomadic, so it always takes place in a different city. The last time, two years ago, we were in Belgrade in a city outside of the European Union. This year, in 2017, we wanted to come to Madrid for quite a lot of different reasons.
tgt: El Festival Sasebo es un foro de conferencias bianual, cultural, político y artístico que reúne una gran variedad de formatos diferentes. Hemos estado haciendo esto ahora como una alternativa europea, la organización detrás de esto, durante 10 años. Así que tenemos bastante experiencia. Al mismo tiempo, es un evento nómada, por lo que siempre se lleva a cabo en una ciudad diferente. La última vez, hace dos años, estuvimos en Belgrado, una ciudad fuera de la Unión Europea. Este año, en 2017, queríamos venir a Madrid por muchas razones diferentes.

src: Tierra del Sol is pleased to present "Vicente Siso: Memories of the Land and Water" at the new gallery location in West Hollywood. Siso was born 1962 in Madrid and raised between Venezuela, Trinidad and Miami; he moved with his family to Southern California in his early 20s.

Siso es artista del Programa de Artes del Estudio desde 2012; esta es su primera exposición individual. Siso nació en 1962 en Madrid y creció entre Venezuela, Trinidad y Miami; su familia se trasladó al sur de California cuando él tenía 20 años.

src: Thomas Puls of IW Köln fears that the strikes will harm the image of Germany as a place for business. Local bosses are already fretting about a German version of the gilets jaunes protests in France in 2018, which culminated in yellow-jacketed demonstrators torching cars on the Champs-Elysées and the police stepping in with tear gas. Jochen Kopelke, head of Germany's police union, warned in an interview with Tagesspiegel, a daily, that the farmers were probably "just the start of an enormous wave of protest this year." Germany was the only big economy to shrink in 2023, and the year ended on an especially sour note, with an unexpected drop in business confidence in December. This year is shaping up to be even tougher.
tgt: 科隆德国经济研究所的托马斯·普尔斯担心，罢工将损害德国作为商业场所的形象。当地老板们已经开始担心德国版“黄背心”抗议活动，该活动曾在 2018 年席卷法国，最终以身穿黄背心的示威者在香榭丽舍大街焚烧汽车和警察施放催泪瓦斯告终。德国警察工会主席约亨·科普尔克在接受日报《每日镜报》采访时警告说，农民的抗议活动可能“只是今年巨大抗议浪潮的开始”。德国是 2023 年唯一一个经济萎缩的主要经济体，而且这一年以一种特别糟糕的方式结束，12 月份商业信心意外下降。今年的情况看起来会更加艰难。

src: In some rural African communities, civil society organizations are replacing a harmful rite of passage with health education. One such program helped Kamanda Timayio, leader of the Masai village of Maparasha, Kenya, change his mind about female genital mutilation. He told Le Monde that he had "emerged from ignorance" and would abandon the practice.
tgt: En algunas comunidades rurales africanas, las organizaciones de la sociedad civil están sustituyendo un rito pernicioso de paso por la educación sanitaria. Uno de esos programas ayudó a Kamanda Timayio, líder de la aldea Masai de Maparasha (Kenya), a cambiar de opinión sobre la mutilación genital femenina. Le dijo a Le Monde que había "emergado de la ignorancia" y que abandonaría la práctica.

src: Where I'm standing would have been the bottom of the Western Interior Sea, about 85 million years ago. Mike Everhard is one of the world's leading experts on Mosesaus. The horizon would have been ocean for as far as you could see, that the seaway stretched for hundreds of miles from where we're standing. At this time, the climate is warmer, so there are no polar ice caps.
tgt: Donde estoy parado habría sido el fondo del Mar Interior Occidental, hace unos 85 millones de años. Mike Everhard es uno de los expertos líderes en el mundo sobre Mosasaurios. El horizonte habría sido océano en todas direcciones, ya que el estrecho marino se extendía por cientos de millas desde donde estamos parados. En ese momento, el clima es más cálido, por lo que no hay casquetes de hielo polares.

src: About 450 million years ago, plants took a giant leap out of the oceans onto the land to become the plants that we know and love today. But how did they survive? Scientists at the John Innes Centre may have found out. Land plants survive by getting water and nutrients from the soil. They do this by forming a special friendship with soil dwelling fungi called mycorrhiza. These strands of mycorrhiza reached deep into the soil and drag the nutrients and water back to the plants. But when the first algae landed on soil, how did they survive long enough to form these beneficial friendships?
tgt: Примерно 450 миллионов лет назад растения совершили гигантский скачок из океанов на сушу и превратились в растения, которые мы знаем и любим сегодня. Но как они смогли выжить? Ученые из Центра Джона Иннеса, возможно, нашли ответ. Наземные растения выживают, получая воду и питательные вещества из почвы. Они делают это, вступая в особое симбиотическое взаимодействие с почвенными грибами, называемыми микоризой. Эти нити микоризы проникают глубоко в почву и доставляют питательные вещества и воду обратно к растениям. Но как первые водоросли выжили на суше достаточно долго, чтобы сформировать эти полезные симбиотические отношения?

src: I hold a relatively slow pace as I approach the door, giving a small holler to Dad. “I’ll be heading out for a bit, dinner is in the fridge.” No response. Figures. He usually hears me though, he’ll probably be fine. Slowly closing the door behind me, I let another breathy sigh escape as the door completely shut. Nearly forgetting, I place my hand on the cold, metallic scanner that locks the door. If there was anything this apartment had, it was advanced tech, but then again; most places had notable technology–it had been a long time since anyone had used any other different technology.
tgt: 我拖着缓慢的步伐向门口走去，轻轻叫了一声爸。“我要出去一会儿，晚饭在冰箱里。” 他没有回应，但身影依然在。他通常都能听到我说话，他会没事的。我慢慢拉上身后的门。在门完全关闭时，又叹了口气。差点忘了，我的手触碰到了用来锁门的冰冷的金属扫描器。如果说这栋公寓有什么值得夸耀的话，那一定是先进技术；但话又说回来，许多地方的技术都非常引人注目——很久没人用过其他技术了。

src: According to the office of the commissioner for the protection of the state language, 3,692 language law violations were reported in 2023. Kiev, Kharkov, and Odessa remain "leaders in terms of the number of complaints of violations. Therefore, strict controls over the observance of the language rights of citizens in all spheres of public life should be among the priorities of community leaders this year," Taras Kremen, the country's Language Ombudsman said.
tgt: По данным аппарата уполномоченного по защите государственного языка, в 2023 году было зафиксировано 3 692 нарушения языкового законодательства. Киев, Харьков и Одесса остаются "лидерами по количеству жалоб на нарушения. Поэтому строгий контроль за соблюдением языковых прав граждан во всех сферах общественной жизни должен быть одним из приоритетов для руководителей общин в этом году", - заявил языковой омбудсмен страны Тарас Кремень.

src: Removing myself from clouded thoughts, I found my way to my favorite coffee spot; most people avoid it because rumors were spread that a lapse was found in the area, which was what society has referred to those whom the virus has infected. tgt: 从混乱的思绪中抽离出来，我找到了我最喜欢的咖啡店；大多数人都会避开这里，因为有传言说这个区域发现了病毒感染者，这就是社会对那些被病毒感染的人的称呼。但这从未真正打扰过我，我一生都有着令人难以置信的好运，而且店主是个非常好的人。谁会放弃深夜的谈话和聊天换取免费的咖啡呢？

This never really disturbed me, I’ve had incredible luck my entire life, plus the owner is a great guy. Who would pass up free coffee in exchange for talks and chats late at night?
tgt: 摆脱了混沌的思绪，我来到了我最喜欢的咖啡馆；大多数人都避开这里，因为有传言说这个地方发现了一个"失误"，这是社会对那些被病毒感染的人的称呼。这从未真正困扰过我，我一生都运气极佳，再说店主也是个很棒的人。谁会放弃深夜畅聊换取免费咖啡的机会呢？

src: The World Bank cites other examples. From 1970 to 2022, Bangladesh quadrupled female literacy rates and doubled female participation in the labor force. Its gross domestic product more than tripled. The change gathered its own momentum. Recruiting salaried women as teachers and health workers from within their own communities boosted trust "and made women's mobility and work more socially acceptable."
tgt: El Banco Mundial cita otros ejemplos. De 1970 a 2022, Bangladesh cuadruplicó las tasas de alfabetización femenina y duplicó la participación femenina en la fuerza laboral. Su producto interno bruto se triplicó con creces. El cambio cobró impulso propio. La contratación de mujeres asalariadas como maestras y trabajadoras sanitarias dentro de sus propias comunidades aumentó la confianza "e hizo que la movilidad y el trabajo de las mujeres fueran más aceptables socialmente".

src: Okay, so this final repair is spine repair. Spine repair, it's a little bit more complicated. There are more steps to it, but if you follow along with me, I think you can easily do it. That way I don't have to worry about creating a paper label or going without a label. So I'll cut this part off first and I'll show you how to clean that up later.
tgt: Bien, entonces esta reparación final es la reparación del lomo. La reparación del lomo es un poco más complicada. Hay más pasos, pero si me siguen, creo que podrán hacerlo fácilmente. Entonces, lo primero que voy a hacer para la reparación del lomo es quitar este lomo viejo. Espero poder guardar esta etiqueta y volver a colocarla en el nuevo material que pondremos sobre el lomo. De esa manera, no tengo que preocuparme por crear una etiqueta de papel o dejarlo sin etiqueta. Así que primero cortaré esta parte y luego les mostraré cómo limpiarla.

src: This is aluminum, aluminum for our industries and aluminum for our homes, aluminum for building, for transportation, for communication, for agriculture, and for national defense. What is it that has made aluminum, one of the youngest members in the family of metals, such an outstanding material? The answer lies in its amazing versatility and unusual combination of properties. Its smart, modern appearance in a variety of natural or colored finishes. Its great strength, combined with extreme lightweight, and outstanding advantage in almost every metal application.
tgt: Это алюминий, алюминий для нашей промышленности и алюминий для наших домов, алюминий для строительства, транспорта, связи, сельского хозяйства и национальной обороны. Что же сделало алюминий, один из самых молодых представителей семейства металлов, таким выдающимся материалом? Разгадка кроется в его удивительной универсальности и необычном сочетании свойств. Элегантный, современный внешний вид благодаря разнообразной натуральной или цветной отделке. Высокая прочность в сочетании с чрезвычайным весом и исключительные преимущества практически при любом применении металла.

src: In some rural African communities, civil society organizations are replacing a harmful rite of passage with health education. One such program helped Kamanda Timayio, leader of the Masai village of Maparasha, Kenya, change his mind about female genital mutilation. He told Le Monde that he had "emerged from ignorance" and would abandon the practice.
tgt: 在一些非洲农村社区，民间社会组织正在用健康教育取代有害的成年仪式。肯尼亚马萨伊村马帕拉沙村的村长卡曼达·蒂马约 (Kamanda Timayio) 就曾通过这样的一个项目改变了对女性生殖器切割的看法。他告诉《世界报》，他已经“摆脱了无知”，并将放弃这种做法。

src: "It is not my role to estimate if the beer sector should have this or that target, as it would depend on the intrinsic characteristics of their own sector," Sánchez Recarte said. "In the same way, brewers should mind their own business and focus on their own responsibilities."

src: Another useful resource the FAA links to is the Boeing Worldwide Statistical Summary of Commercial Jet Airplane Accidents 1959-2022, which assesses plane-type safety by breaking down accidents based on the aircraft model. According to the report, which was published in September 2023, the Boeing 787 and Airbus A350 are the aircraft models with the fewest total hull losses, an accident in which the aircraft is destroyed beyond repair. There are a few additional models in the report that have never experienced a hull loss, including the double-decker behemoth Airbus A380. But those models had accumulated fewer than 1 million departures at the time of the report.
tgt: Otro recurso útil a los enlaces de la FAA es el Boeing Worldwide Statistical Summary of Commercial Jet Airplane Accidents 1959-2022, que evalúa la seguridad del tipo de avión rompiendo los accidentes basándose en el modelo de avión. Según el informe, que se publicó en septiembre de 2023, el Boeing 787 y Airbus A350 son los modelos de avión con la menor pérdida total de casco, un accidente en el que el avión se destruye más allá de la reparación. Hay algunos modelos adicionales en el informe que nunca han experimentado una pérdida de casco, incluyendo el behemoth de doble piso Airbus A380. Sin embargo, esos modelos habían acumulado menos de 1 millón de salidas en el momento de elaborarse el informe.

src: Our planning system also needs to adapt so that planners in suburban councils, who seem to be less supportive of change, are not the only determinants of the future shape of their suburbs. A way forward could be to have an independent decision-making body that championed quality design as long as it fitted below the tree tops and incorporated family living, large balconies, common gardens and presented a friendly appearance. This could be a role for the current NSW government architect working within a carefully crafted complying code.
tgt: Наша система планирования также должна адаптироваться, чтобы планировщики в пригородных советах, которые, похоже, менее поддерживают изменения, не были единственными, кто определяет будущий облик своих пригородов. Одним из путей вперед могло бы стать создание независимого органа, принимающего решения, который бы поддерживал качественный дизайн, при условии, что он вписывается в высоту ниже верхушек деревьев и включает в себя семейное проживание, большие балконы, общие сады и имеет дружелюбный внешний вид. Эту роль мог бы взять на себя нынешний главный архитектор штата Новый Южный Уэльс, работающий в рамках тщательно разработанного кодекса соответствия.

src: This is an authentic and real old footage, of a true certain giant individual from Japan, walking in some military parade. What's shocking about it, is his actual size. tgt: Esta es una filmación antigua, auténtica y real, de un individuo gigante real de Japón, caminando en algún desfile militar. Lo impactante es su tamaño real. Tiene una estatua de al menos 4 metros de altura, lo que equivale a un mínimo de 13 pies. Por lo tanto, es realmente más alto y más corpulento que cualquier otro jugador de la NBA, por ejemplo, como Shaquille O'Neill o Yao Ming.

src: Moving the surveillance onto my mobile device, I watched each one intently. Nothing. It was like they were never there. That makes no sense. Cameras had tight security, even with remote access. How..? ARGH. I stood angrily, ready to remove some thoughts from my head – I made my way over, sliding on shoes and taking my keys. “I’ll be back soon, Dad.”Silence. Whatever, he didn’t usually respond, he was probably busy doing something more important than me anyway.
tgt: Переключив наблюдение на свое мобильное устройство, я внимательно следил за каждым из них. Ничего. Как будто их никогда там и не было. Это не имеет смысла. Камеры были надежно защищены, даже при удаленном доступе. Как..? АРР. Я сердито встал, готовый выбросить некоторые мысли из головы – я направился к выходу, надевая обувь и беря ключи. "Я скоро вернусь, папа." Тишина. Неважно, он обычно не отвечал, вероятно, он был занят чем-то более важным, чем я, в любом случае.

src: Walking inside, a loud ring dispelled my discomfort as the aroma of freshly brewed coffee filled my lungs. Anton, the man who owned the store, was of course the person behind the counter – the place was practically empty except for a few people in the back. Approaching the counter, my feet tired from a long walk, I droop atop one of the stools and yawn. I spot Anton bringing the regular thankfully. “Hey Lilith, Long night?” his raspy voice echoed within the fractals of my brain, “Something of the sort,” I replied shallowly, more tired and tired by the second.
tgt: 走进去，一声响亮的铃声驱散了我的不适，新鲜煮好的咖啡的香味充满了我的肺。店主安东尼当然是柜台后面的人——店里除了后面的几个人的确空无一人。走到柜台前，我漫长的脚步让我感到脚步疲惫，我在凳子上耷拉着，打哈欠。我看到安东尼正在给常客上菜。他沙哑的声音在我脑中的分形中回响：“莉莉丝，漫长的夜晚？”“某种程度上的确如此，”我浅浅地回答道，每秒都更加疲惫。

src: Moscow maintains that such laws violate the rights of Russian-speaking people, who make up around half of Ukraine's population. Russian Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Maria Zakharova said in February that Kiev's "discriminatory campaign" against the language was growing more and more "indignant." In a survey conducted last September by the Kiev International Institute of Sociology, respondents cited language discrimination as the most common type of prejudice in Ukraine, with 45% saying it was a problem.
tgt: Moscú sostiene que tales leyes violan los derechos de las personas de habla rusa, quienes constituyen alrededor de la mitad de la población de Ucrania. La portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de Rusia, Maria Zakharova, dijo en febrero que la "campaña discriminatoria" de Kiev contra el idioma se estaba volviendo cada vez más "indignante". En una encuesta realizada en septiembre pasado por el Instituto Internacional de Sociología de Kiev, los encuestados citaron la discriminación lingüística como el tipo de prejuicio más común en Ucrania, con un 45% diciendo que era un problema.

Ahora, la serie ROG Phone es bien conocida por sus pastillas para juegos, pero en este video, averiguaremos si el ROG Phone 5 realmente está recuperando la corona como el rey de los juegos.

src: The walk home was quiet, but so loud. The thoughts infecting my brain were booming, and the regret of not having stayed to help flashed over multiple times. I finally arrived home, almost brought to tears by the dreadful walk in the burst of sounds from the clouds above, the thunderous booms were enough to frighten any person sometimes. Dad was already passed out on the couch, some rerun of an older movie, probably 10-12 years old; sighing, I quietly crept my way back to my room. Flopping in the bed, I wasn’t able to keep my eyes open for long. Before long, slumber crept up on me.
tgt: Дорога домой была тихой, но в то же время громкой. Мысли, заражающие мой мозг, гремели, а сожаление о том, что я не остался помочь, вспыхивало снова и снова. Наконец я добрался до дома, почти доведенный до слез этой ужасной прогулкой под взрывами звуков из облаков наверху; громовые раскаты порой могли напугать кого угодно. Папа уже отключился на диване, шел повтор какого-то старого фильма, вероятно, 10-12-летней давности; вздохнув, я тихонько прокрался в свою комнату. Плюхнувшись на кровать, я не смог долго держать глаза открытыми. Вскоре сон подкрался ко мне.

src: The FTSE 250 firm is to open between 140 and 160 outlets on a net basis in 2024 as it looks to give customers more convenient access to its stores. It will keep looking at expanding across retail parks, travel sites, and roadside locations, plus industrial estates. Currie said: "Where there's any location where you can't currently access a Greggs easily, we want to try and get into that location."
tgt: 该富时 250 指数公司计划在 2024 年净增开设 140 到 160 家门店，以便为顾客提供更方便的购物体验。该公司将继续在零售公园、旅游地点、沿路位置以及工业园区进行扩张。库里表示：“在任何无法轻松访问 Greggs 的地方，我们都想努力将门店开设到那里。”

src: Shifts in thought are harder to quantify than bank loans for rural women or school enrollment for girls. Yet there is plenty of evidence that female agency can move mountains. In Iran, for example, women have led the greatest threat to the Islamic government in 40 years simply by refusing to comply with laws that force them to cover their hair. In some of the 130 countries with minimum quotas for female representation in government, such as India, male resistance to female voting and political activism has eased.
tgt: 思想观念的转变比农村女性获得银行贷款更难量化。然而，有足够的证据表明，女性的行动可以动山摇地。例如，在伊朗，仅仅因为拒绝遵守那些迫使她们盖头的法律，女性就领导了40年来伊斯兰政府面临的最大威胁。在印度等130个有最低女性代表政府配额的国家中，男性对女性投票和政治活动的抵制有所放松。

src: Below, Nyssi scrambled to her feet. She was pretty sure she had broken something, but her weird, unnatural healing powers had already kicked in. The same couldn't have been said for Thassalin, who was lying in a lump, resting against the one tree that hadn't collapsed under his weight. Nyssi did her best to try and reach Thassalin but she could barely see more than a couple of meters in front of her. Everything was pitch black and engulfed in unholy shadows. And in said shadows, something was screaming and screeching.
tgt: Nyssi se levantó con dificultad. Estaba bastante segura de haberse roto algo, pero sus extraños y sobrenaturales poderes curativos ya habían comenzado a actuar. Lo mismo no se podía decir de Thassalin, que se encontraba en el suelo, apoyándose en el único árbol que no se había derrumbado bajo su peso. Nyssi hizo todo lo posible para ayudar a Thassalin, pero apenas podía ver más de unos pocos metros por delante de ella. Todo estaba completamente oscuro, sumido en sombras impenetrables. Y en esas sombras, algo estaba gritando y chillando.

src: Chief executive Roisin Currie told PA she has "no plans currently" to up prices at the till as it expects a more stable cost base over the year ahead. However, she added that it would be "a long time before we see deflation" that would allow the group to start reducing prices, with retailers among those facing higher wage bills due to increases in the national living wage - although she added that the trend of bigger pay packets is "good news as it puts more money into consumers" pockets."
tgt: Генеральный директор Roisin Currie сообщила PA, что у нее «нет планов на данный момент» повышать цены на кассе, так как она ожидает более стабильной стоимости базы в ближайшем году. Однако она добавила, что «пройдет много времени, прежде чем мы увидим дефляцию», которая позволит группе начать снижать цены, при этом розничные торговцы среди тех, кто сталкивается с более высокими счетами за заработную плату из-за увеличений национальной минимальной заработной платы - хотя она добавила, что тенденция более высоких пакетов заработной платы «хорошая новость, так как это кладет больше денег в карманы потребителей».

src: Expressing a comparable sentiment on her Twitter account, Political Analyst and Development & Management Consultant, Barrister Iyabo Awokoya, conveyed sympathy for the suspended minister. She believed that the minister might have made an innocent mistake driven by a zealous determination to accomplish her job.
tgt: Выражая схожие чувства в своем аккаунте в Twitter, политический аналитик и консультант по вопросам развития и управления, адвокат Иябо Авокоя выразила сочувствие отстраненному министру. Она считает, что министр, возможно, совершила невинную ошибку, вызванную ревностным стремлением выполнить свою работу.

src: How did you very early on, considered or realized that, well, engineering, is just part of the challenge, especially that we're taught as engineers that we're dealing with issues, right? And we're finding solutions. That's our job. How did you came across that so early on? Well, it was a strange coincidence, so to speak. Of course, I grew up in the 1970s. I gained my political consciousness, as well as my academic understanding in the 1970s and that context matters, of course, massively.
tgt: 你很早就考虑或意识到，工程只是挑战的一部分，尤其是我们作为工程师被教导要处理问题，对吗？我们正在寻找解决方案。这是我们的工作。你是怎么这么早就遇到这种情况的呢？嗯，可以说这是一个奇怪的巧合。当然，我是在 20 世纪 70 年代长大的。我在 20 世纪 70 年代获得了政治意识，以及学术理解，当然，这种背景很重要。

src: I like to wear gloves just because stainless edges are usually pretty sharp, like a razor, so you don't want to cut yourself up while you're trying to straighten it. I like to use the table as a dolly a lot of the time. They do also offer specialty trim or jeweler's hammers is what they're sometimes called. Also trim angles. But in this case, since it's a large flat piece, I'm just going to go ahead and use my standalone auto body hammer.
tgt: Me gusta usar guantes porque los bordes de acero inoxidable suelen ser bastante afilados, como una navaja, y no querrás cortarte mientras intentas enderezarlo. Me gusta usar la mesa como plataforma rodante la mayor parte del tiempo. También ofrecen martillos especiales para recortar o de joyero, como se les llama a veces. También ángulos de corte. Pero en este caso, como es una pieza plana grande, voy a seguir adelante y usar mi martillo de carrocería independiente.

I'm not freaked out by it's... All right, fine. I'm freaked out. I'm having nightmares that I'm being chased by this giant, robotic. done!
tgt: 你真是个混蛋。听着，西莉亚，我们必须追随自己的激情。你有你的机器人技术，而我只想在太空中变得很棒。你为什么不直接告诉我你被我的机器手吓到了？我并没有被它吓到...好吧，行。我是被吓到了。我做噩梦梦到被一个巨大的机器人追赶。完成了！

src: 603 right now on this Wednesday morning, and we are following a tragic story this morning. A teenager is dead after police found her body in an eastside ditch. The gruesome discovery was made hours after her parents reported her missing, saying she had left on a walk last night. News For Tony Davis is live this morning with more on the circumstances that may have led to her death in the police investigation. Good morning, Tony.
tgt: Сейчас 6:03 утра среды, и мы следим за трагической новостью. Подросток погибла, её тело обнаружили полицейские в канаве на востоке города. Страшную находку сделали через несколько часов после того, как родители заявили о пропаже дочери, сказав, что вечером она ушла на прогулку. В прямом эфире с нами Тони Дэвис, который расскажет подробнее об обстоятельствах, возможно приведших к её смерти, и о ходе полицейского расследования. Доброе утро, Тони.

src: Initial applications to Harvard for a psychology masters were rejected, but was eventually admitted. The initial setbacks were due to Milgramm not taking any undergraduate courses in psychology at Queens College. In 1961, Milgram received a PhD in social psychology. He became an assistant professor at Yale around the same time.
tgt: 哈佛心理学硕士的初始申请被拒绝，但最终被录取。初始挫折是由于米尔格拉姆在皇后学院没有修读任何心理学本科课程。1961年，米尔格拉姆获得了社会心理学博士学位。同期，他成为了耶鲁大学的助理教授。

src: He admitted that the age-old problem of delayed discharge - in which patients well enough to leave hospital cannot do so, often because the necessary social care is not available - was a "major factor," but claimed an action plan was being "implemented at pace." Given this has been a persistent issue for years, few will have high hopes the SNP has finally found a solution.
tgt: 他承认，延迟出院这一古老问题是一个“主要因素”，患者身体状况良好但无法出院，通常是因为缺乏必要的社会护理，但他声称一项行动计划正在“加速实施”。鉴于这一问题多年来一直存在，很少有人对苏格兰民族党最终找到解决方案抱有很高期望。

src: Irregularly, Anton’s was pretty busy; it was bustling with activity and new faces that I’ve never seen before – Anton was regularly the only worker, so knowing that he must be pretty stressed. “Hey Barkeep, get me a coffee.” I purposely spoke in a lower tone to throw him off a bit, a small chuckle escaping me seeing his sigh of relief after turning quickly. “God, Lilith, don’t do that to me…” he softly let out, obviously tired. “You seem pretty busy…you need some help? Look’s like there's more than plenty of folks here.” I huffed out, I do not want to help with these drunks, but I feel bad making this guy work alone out here. “Could you? I’ll pay you after…” he uttered with the eyes of a puppy, aimed straight at me. Advanced War Tactics…
tgt: Необычно, но у Антона было довольно людно; бар кипел жизнью, полный незнакомых лиц – обычно Антон работал один, так что он наверняка на взводе. "Эй, бармен, кофе мне". Я нарочно говорила низким голосом, чтобы его немного сбить с толку, и тихонько хихикнула, увидев его облегченный вздох, когда он обернулся. "Боже, Лилит, не пугай меня так..." - тихо выдохнул он, явно уставший. "Похоже, у тебя аншлаг... нужна помощь? Тут явно больше народу, чем обычно". Я фыркнула, мне не хотелось возиться с этими пьяницами, но было жаль заставлять парня работать одного. "Правда поможешь? Я заплачу потом..." - пробормотал он, глядя на меня щенячьими глазами. Продвинутая военная тактика...

src: The advancement of Humanity never ceased, even for a moment–during difficult times we grow and adapt once again. The cities are as prosperous as ever, and our technological advancement is rising. With our recent discovery of Ignniat, humanity has once skyrocketed past its peak; the greatest has yet to be achieved. This grace of newfound knowledge could only be described as divine intervention - we humanity will be able to grace the gods with our presence in their land in the clouds. Everyone within the company of Karascene has evaluated Ignniat and we sense a large potential within this mineral – worry not, Ignniat has not been evaluated to have any side effects or downsides of being mined, it has a higher chance to–
tgt: 人类的进步从未停止过，哪怕是一刻——在困难时期，我们再次成长和适应。城市一如既往地繁荣，我们的技术进步也在不断提升。随着我们最近发现 Ignniat，人类一度飞速发展，超越了巅峰；最伟大的成就尚未实现。这种新发现知识的恩惠只能被描述为神的干预——我们人类将能够以我们在云端土地上的存在来恩惠众神。Karascene 公司的每个人都对 Ignniat 进行了评估，我们感觉到这种矿物具有巨大的潜力——不用担心，Ignniat 尚未被评估为开采后会产生任何副作用或不利影响，它更有可能——

src: Alborn was a great guy, but this looked serious. No need to stick my nose out for someone, especially when they seem like they’ve just gotten into trouble with every authority in the city. Yet, I still couldn’t shake the feeling. Letting a silent sigh escape me, I slowly warped off the grate below, dropping down into the quiet room. “Psst. Al. Al!” I whispered, giving a soft yell at his lack of response. “Lilith? What are you doing here..? You’ve gotta leave, he’ll catch you.”
tgt: Alborn era un tipo genial, pero esto se veía serio. No era necesario meter mi nariz en asuntos ajenos, sobre todo cuando parecía que él acababa de tener problemas con todas las autoridades de la ciudad. Aún así, no conseguía deshacerme de esa sensación. Dejando escapar un suspiro en silencio, salí lentamente de la rejilla de abajo para caer en la habitación silenciosa. «¡Psst, Al! ¡Al!», susurré, y di un pequeño grito al no recibir respuesta alguna. «¿Lilith? ¿Qué haces aquí...? Debes irte, él te atrapará.»

src: A horrible, clubbed tail smashed into the ground near Nyssi, knocking her over. She noticed though that the tail was flailing, not aiming at her. src: Brewster Brothers" wash plants transform 100 per cent of the excavated soils and rubble they process from the construction industry into high-value aggregates for reuse. It has created more than one million tonnes of recycled aggregates to sell into the industry.

src: Thus, we had the introduction of the Cost of Living (Tenant protection) (Scotland) Act 2022 nearly 18 months ago which sought to cap rents for a limited period to ease the pressures of the cost-of-living crisis. What we find now from the latest Scottish Government statistics is that, in the last year alone, average rents have increased in all sized properties, ranging from the lowest rise of 11.7 per cent for one-bedroom to the highest figure of 14.3 per cent for two-bedroom homes. Every type of property (from one to four bedroom to a room in a property) has had a double digit increase in rents since the Cost of Living legislation was introduced in October 2022, exceeding the annual average increases in rents over the previous 12 years by a factor of at least three.
tgt: Por lo tanto, hace casi 18 meses se introdujo la Ley sobre el costo de la vida (protección del inquilino) (Escocia) de 2022, que buscaba limitar los alquileres durante un período limitado para aliviar las presiones de la crisis del costo de la vida. Lo que encontramos ahora en las últimas estadísticas del gobierno escocés es que, sólo en el último año, los alquileres medios han aumentado en propiedades de todos los tamaños, desde el aumento más bajo del 11,7 por ciento para las viviendas de un dormitorio hasta la cifra más alta del 14,3 por ciento para las viviendas de un dormitorio. viviendas de dos dormitorios. Cada tipo de propiedad (desde una a cuatro habitaciones hasta una habitación en una propiedad) ha tenido un aumento de dos dígitos en los alquileres desde que se introdujo la legislación sobre el costo de vida en octubre de 2022, superando los aumentos promedio anuales de los alquileres durante los 12 años anteriores en un factor de al menos tres.

src: Nearby Basil was awoken by an emergency alert as a Faustmanning gas cloud from the blaze was spread across the area. Locals were told not to leave their homes and to close all windows and doors, although this alert was lifted around 7 AM when the smoke was thought to be non fatal. It wouldn't be the air so much as the water that would be heavily polluted, and it would be the very water used to douse the flames that would caused the disaster. The highly toxic mercury compounds were present as fungicides in sea dressings in the warehouse, and were marked with fluorescent red dye Rhodamine B.
tgt: 基利附近的巴塞利被紧急警报惊醒，一股火灾中的福斯曼气体正在扩散。当地人被告知不要离开家，并关闭所有窗户和门，尽管这条警报在上午7点左右被取消，因为人们认为烟雾并非致命。烟雾并不是空气，而是水，而水才是造成灾难的罪魁祸首。仓库中含有大量有毒汞化合物的海鲜调味料，标有荧光红染料罗丹明B。

Everyone within the company of Karascene has evaluated Ignniat and we sense a large potential within this mineral – worry not, Ignniat has not been evaluated to have any side effects or downsides of being mined, it has a higher chance to–
tgt: 人类的发展从未停止，即使是一刻——在困难时期，我们成长并再次适应。城市比以往任何时候都繁荣，我们的技术进步正在上升。随着我们最近对伊格尼亚特的发现，人类再次超越了它的巅峰；最伟大的还没有被实现。这种新发现知识的恩典只能被描述为神灵干预——我们人类将能够在云中的土地上与神灵的陪伴恩典。在卡拉场景公司中的每个人都评估了伊格尼亚特，我们在这个矿物中感到了巨大的潜力——别担心，伊格尼亚特已经被评估为没有被挖掘的副作用或不利影响，它有更高的机会——

src: Reversing the trend of jail deaths, and solving the many other issues facing our jails, may require some difficult policy decisions. However, independent oversight of jails is a critical first step toward a safer and more humane jail system. Independent oversight is a demonstrated means of improving transparency and accountability both in Washington and across the country. By our count, at least 25 states have a statewide office responsible for overseeing jails, and all of them have a lower rate of jail deaths than Washington.
tgt: Revertir la tendencia de muertes en las cárceles, y resolver los muchos otros problemas que enfrentan nuestras cárceles, puede requerir algunas decisiones políticas difíciles. Sin embargo, la supervisión independiente de las cárceles es un primer paso fundamental hacia un sistema carcelario más seguro y humano. La supervisión independiente es un medio demostrado para mejorar la transparencia y la rendición de cuentas tanto en Washington como en todo el país. Según nuestro recuento, al menos 25 estados tienen una oficina estatal responsable de supervisar las cárceles, y todos ellos tienen una tasa de mortalidad en las cárceles más baja que Washington.

src: The problems at the EPA are distinct but not unrelated to those at the Department of Justice, which handles environmental crimes via its Environment and Natural Resources Division, or ENRD. Prior to joining the EPA, Uhlmann - the EPA assistant secretary for enforcement - had served as the longtime head of that division's Environmental Crimes Section, from 1990 through 2007. The EPA sends its most serious civil and criminal cases to ENRD, which - as a relatively underfunded office - often relies on other agencies in helping to choose which fights to take on. In fiscal year 2022, the EPA deferred fewer cases to DOJ (88) than at any point since 2000 and concluded fewer civil judicial cases than it had since that time, as well. As the Environmental Integrity Project notes, even Trump's EPA concluded 94 civil cases and deferred 106 cases per year to the DOJ per year, on average.
tgt: 环境保护局的问题与司法部的环境犯罪部门（EPRD），也就是美国环保署所属自然资源和环境事务分署有关联。在加入该机构之前——作为执法助理秘书—乌尔曼曾经担任了这一办公室长期负责环评工作的管理部分主任职务从1993年到2008年的时间里。“我知道”项目指出：即便特朗普时代的大气污染案件数量也不及前任总统每一年平均数的一半；大约有八成刑事诉讼案由此处处理并送交道内进行审判、而不是其他国家机关帮助其作出选择哪些争端需要面对法律制裁。财政年度2022财年来至多向联邦检察官提起少于2000年以来任何一项民事法庭辩护案以及仅就这十年间提出十六件公正管辖范围内的行政听证会案例等级较低且相对资金有限的情况下还能完成这些工作。

src: To create the antique brass ornament, I just went in with a coat of rub and buff onto the entire ornament there. And then of course, we have to get that antique look with the alcohol ink. So I went in with ginger first, I applied a droplet onto our ornament and just blended it out like so. And I just continued that process until I had as many layers as I liked, and it looked really antique in like an actual metal ornament. After that, I did go in with a little bit more of that burnished amber spray paint as well to supply that to the surface, to kind of give it that oxidized look like we did for the bell ornaments. And that is how I finished off these antique brass bubbles. Really simple and easy, but honestly, they look like real metal and they're beautiful.
tgt: 为了制作古董黄铜装饰品，我只是在整个装饰品上涂了一层rub and buff。然后当然，我们必须用酒精墨水来打造那种古董外观。所以我先用姜黄色，在装饰品上滴一滴，然后像这样把它晕染开。我不断重复这个过程，直到我涂了足够多的层数，让它看起来像真正的金属装饰品一样，具有真正的古董感。在那之后，我又喷了一些青铜色喷漆，把它喷在表面，让它看起来像我们做的铃铛装饰品一样，有一种氧化的感觉。这就是我完成这些古董黄铜球的方法。非常简单容易，但说实话，它们看起来像真金属一样，很漂亮。

src: The Zoroastrian text, Veda, states that Yema built an underground city on the orders of the god Arua Mazda, to protect his people from a catastrophic winner. Al igual que en el relato de Noé en la Biblia, a Yima se le ordenó reunir parejas de los mejores animales y personas, así como las mejores semillas para repoblar la Tierra después del cataclismo invernal. Esto ocurrió antes de la última Edad de Hielo, hace 110,000 años.

src: With digital tools, it is easier than ever to create, edit, and publish your work to the world. But there's a cost. It's also easier than ever to spread misinformation, and fake news has become a real issue in recent times. We see this with students. According to a Stanford study, only 25 % of high school students were able to identify an accurate news story compared to a fake one. Students also had a hard time distinguishing between real and fake photographs as well as authentic and staged videos.
tgt: 有了数字化工具，创作、编辑和发布作品比以往任何时候都更容易。然而，这也有代价。传播虚假信息比以往任何时候都更容易，近些年来，假新闻成为了一大问题。我们在学生身上看到了这一点。根据斯坦福大学的一项研究，只有25%的高中学生能够区分真实新闻和假新闻。而学生也很难区分真实照片和假照片以及真实视频和摆拍视频。

src: The problems at the EPA are distinct but not unrelated to those at the Department of Justice, which handles environmental crimes via its Environment and Natural Resources Division, or ENRD. Prior to joining the EPA, Uhlmann - the EPA assistant secretary for enforcement - had served as the longtime head of that division's Environmental Crimes Section, from 1990 through 2007. The EPA sends its most serious civil and criminal cases to ENRD, which - as a relatively underfunded office - often relies on other agencies in helping to choose which fights to take on. In fiscal year 2022, the EPA deferred fewer cases to DOJ (88) than at any point since 2000 and concluded fewer civil judicial cases than it had since that time, as well. As the Environmental Integrity Project notes, even Trump's EPA concluded 94 civil cases and deferred 106 cases per year to the DOJ per year, on average.
tgt: Los problemas en la EPA son distintos pero no están relacionados con los del Departamento de Justicia, que trata los delitos ambientales a través de su División de Medio Ambiente y Recursos Naturales, o ENRD. Antes de unirse a la EPA, Uhlmann, la subsecretaria adjunta para la aplicación de la ley, había servido como la jefa de la Sección de Delitos Ambientales de esa división desde 1990 hasta 2007. La EPA envía sus casos más graves civiles y criminales al ENRD, que - como una oficina relativamente poco financiada - a menudo se apoya en otras agencias para elegir los casos en los que luchar. En el año fiscal 2022, la EPA envió menos casos al DOJ (88) que en cualquier momento desde 2000 y concluyó menos casos judiciales civiles que en cualquier momento desde entonces, también. Como señala el Proyecto de Integridad Ambiental, incluso la EPA de Trump concluyó 94 casos civiles y envió 106 casos al DOJ por año, de media.

src: In an interview with Ventures Africa, an anonymous Senior Legal Official from a leading commercial bank commented, "There are several issues concerning this matter. First, her ministry is relatively new, and her predecessor and pioneering minister, Sadiya Umar-Farouk, engaged in activities that appeared to be illegal. It might be a reflection of how they operate in the ministry. Nevertheless, paying public money into private accounts goes against public procurement rules." He added that unless she can provide a valid reason for such approval, it may not necessarily involve fraudulent intent, but it is nonetheless incorrect, and certainty is lacking.
tgt: В интервью Ventures Africa анонимный старший юридический чиновник из ведущего коммерческого банка прокомментировал: «У этого вопроса несколько аспектов. Во-первых, ее министерство относительно новое, и ее предшественник и пионер-министр Садия Умар-Фарук занимались деятельностью, которая выглядела незаконной. Это может отражать то, как они действуют в министерстве. Тем не менее, перечисление государственных денег на частные счета противоречит правилам государственных закупок». Он добавил, что, если она не сможет предоставить действительное основание для такого одобрения, это может не обязательно подразумевать мошеннические намерения, но это все же неправильно, и определенности нет.

Everyone within the company of Karascene has evaluated Ignniat and we sense a large potential within this mineral – worry not, Ignniat has not been evaluated to have any side effects or downsides of being mined, it has a higher chance to–
tgt: 人类从未停止前进的脚步，即便是片刻——我们在困境中成长、调整，然后涅槃重生。城市一如既往地繁荣，科技进步更是日新月异。最近随着Ignniat的发现，人类再次取得了突破性的进展，更辉煌的成就在等着我们去创造。这次的新发现只能用“天降神助”来容易。据此，人类将能够腾上云端，为诸神带来荣光。Karascene公司所有人都对Ignniat进行了评估，大家无一例外地意识到了这种矿产所蕴含的巨大潜力——别担心，Ignniat尚未被评估发现存在任何副作用或是开采方面的不利因素，而是更有可能——

src: Venice City on the water. A place of beauty and romance that attracts millions of visitors every year. This film explores a Venice that few people ever see, a city that has a surprising double life.
tgt: Venecia, ciudad en el agua. Un lugar de belleza y romance que atrae millones de visitantes cada año. A pocos pasos de las rutas turísticas más transitadas, se encuentra una Venecia muy diferente, poblada por fascinantes criaturas. Esta película explora una Venecia que pocas personas jamás ven, una ciudad que tiene una sorprendente doble vida.

src: An 83-hour wait in a hospital A&E; four-in-ten patients waiting longer than four hours; 30 ambulances queuing outside a hospital, unable to respond to other emergency calls; staff "leaving shifts in tears" over the standard of care and "a near collapse of performance," according to an expert at the Royal College of Emergency Medicine.

src: The enemy of my enemy is my friend. Disagree. If the enemy of your enemy were your friend, he'd explicitly be your friend. You know, oftentimes people can work together for a time, united by their dislike for something or someone. But if that relationship was conceived by your mutual dislike for whatever that thing is, what's to stop that relationship from dissolving or becoming hostile after that thing is taken care of. Like the foundation of a friendship is much more stable than that. But you know, I also understand the short term strategy behind it, so I'll just disagree.
tgt: Враг моего врага - мой друг. Не согласен. Если враг твоего врага был бы твоим другом, он явно был бы твоим другом. Вы знаете, часто люди могут работать вместе на протяжении какого-то времени, объединенные своей неприязнью к чему-то или кому-то. Но если это отношение было рождено вашей взаимной неприязнью к тому, что это за вещь, что остановит это отношение от распада или перехода в враждебное после того, как эта вещь будет уничтожена? Как основа дружбы намного более стабильна, чем это. Но вы знаете, я также понимаю краткосрочную стратегию за этим, поэтому я просто не согласен.

src: In a recent incident involving Betta Edu, the Minister of Humanitarian Affairs and Poverty Alleviation in President Bola Ahmed Tinubu's administration, there have been calls for her removal from office amid allegations of misappropriation of a N585 million palliative fund. src: Speaking on behalf of Edu, Rasheed Zubair, her media aide, asserts that the act is legal within the framework of the Nigerian civil service. However, it is crucial to note that the request violates various sections of Nigeria's Financial Regulations 2009, which explicitly prohibit fraud and other forms of corruption in government business. Additionally, Chapter Seven, Section 713 of Nigeria's Financial Regulations 2009 explicitly states, "Personal money shall in no circumstances be paid into a government bank account, nor shall any public money be paid into a private account." It further stipulates, "Any officer who pays public money into a private account is deemed to have done so with fraudulent intention."
tgt: En nombre de Edu, Rasheed Zubair, su asistente de medios, afirma que el acto es legal dentro del marco de la administración pública nigeriana. Sin embargo, es crucial señalar que la solicitud viola varios artículos de las Regulaciones Financieras de Nigeria de 2009, que explícitamente prohíben el fraude y otras formas de corrupción en los negocios gubernamentales. Además, el Capítulo VII, Sección 713 de las Regulaciones Financieras de Nigeria de 2009 establece, "El dinero personal no debe ser depositado en una cuenta bancaria del gobierno, ni el dinero público debe ser depositado en una cuenta bancaria privada". Además, establece, "Cualquier funcionario que deposita el dinero público en una cuenta bancaria privada se considera que lo hace con la intención de cometer fraude".

src: It is December 1997, and the Imperial Sugar Company is acquiring a new production site at Port Wentworth, from Savannah Foods and Industries Incorporated. There is nothing really of note here, it was doing what businesses do, and that is acquiring to expand. The site has been home to food production and processing since the early 1900s. Savannah Industries Incorporated, began construction of granulated sugar production facilities at Port Wentworth during the 1910s, completing it in 1917.
tgt: Es diciembre de 1997, y la Imperial Sugar Company está adquiriendo un nuevo sitio de producción en Port Wentworth, de Savannah Foods and Industries Incorporated. No hay nada realmente destacable aquí, estaba haciendo lo que las empresas hacen, y es adquirir para expandirse. El sitio ha sido hogar de la producción y procesamiento de alimentos desde principios del siglo XX. Savannah Industries Incorporated, comenzó la construcción de instalaciones de producción de azúcar granulado en Port Wentworth durante la década de 1910, completándolo en 1917.

src: Affordable furniture DIYs are always a hit here on Lone Fox, so I wanted to share with you guys how I created this nightstand from a simple crate from IKEA. So this is the Nagle crate, which you can pick up for about $10 at IKEA. And I went ahead and I started off by just constructing it based off the instructions. You have to just screw all of the elements together. And once they are all screwed up, you have a basic wooden crate. Now on the bottom of the wooden crate, I wanted to add a leg, so I elevated it off the floor with these little wooden trinket dishes or like little wooden trays that I found at the craft store as well. They are just a simple wood, very similar to the one from IKEA, and I just e 6,000 these down. You could also use a nail gun if you'd like to. And once you are done, you have a very simple, minimal nightstand.
tgt: Los muebles asequibles de bricolaje siempre son un éxito aquí en Lone Fox, así que quería compartir con ustedes cómo creé esta mesita de noche a partir de una simple caja de IKEA. Esta es la caja Nagle, que pueden comprar por unos 10 dólares en IKEA. Empecé construyéndola siguiendo las instrucciones. Solo tienen que atornillar todos los elementos juntos. Y una vez que están todos atornillados, tienen una caja de madera básica. Ahora, en la parte inferior de la caja de madera, quería añadir una pata, así que la elevé del suelo con estos pequeños platillos de madera o como pequeñas bandejas de madera que encontré también en la tienda de manualidades. Son simplemente de madera, muy similares a los de IKEA, y los pegué con adhesivo E6000. También pueden usar una pistola de clavos si lo prefieren. Y una vez que terminen, tienen una mesita de noche muy simple y minimalista.

src: Shifts in thought are harder to quantify than bank loans for rural women or school enrollment for girls. Yet there is plenty of evidence that female agency can move mountains. In Iran, for example, women have led the greatest threat to the Islamic government in 40 years simply by refusing to comply with laws that force them to cover their hair. In some of the 130 countries with minimum quotas for female representation in government, such as India, male resistance to female voting and political activism has eased.
tgt: 思想的转变比为农村妇女提供银行贷款或女孩入学更难量化。然而，有足够的证据表明女性能动可以移山。例如，在伊朗，妇女拒绝遵守强制它们遮盖头发的法律，这对伊斯兰政府40年来的最大威胁。在130多个拥有政府中女性代表最低配额的国家中，例如印度，男性对女性投票和政治活动的抵抗已经减弱。

src: For Raptor specialist Bob Anderson, the pioneer's attitude was simply arrogant and ignorant. All birds of prey were just considered vermin. I mean, they were all chicken hawks. They were all bad birds, be it a bald eagle, golden eagle, a red to a hawk. They were all shot.
tgt: Para el especialista en rapaces Bob Anderson, la actitud de los pioneros era simplemente arrogante e ignorante. Todas las aves de presa eran consideradas simplemente como alimañas. Es decir, todas eran halcones come-pollos. Todas eran aves malas, ya fuera un águila calva, un águila real o un halcón de cola roja. Todas eran abatidas a tiros.

src: Stealthily I made my way towards the back of the store, murmurs and talking heard beyond a metal grate which took a few yanks to tear off. Climbing into the vent was the safest and quietest option for me right now; climbing my way through, I’d pick up on conversations and talks between strangely dressed men. I noticed Al inside, chained. Figures he’d get caught eventually.
tgt: Я незаметно пробрался к задней части магазина, за металлической решеткой были слышны шепот и разговоры. Чтобы сорвать ее, пришлось потянуть несколько раз. Проникнуть в вентиляцию было самым безопасным и тихим вариантом на данный момент. Пробираясь сквозь нее, я подслушивал разговоры странно одетых мужчин. Я заметил прикованного цепью Ала внутри. Фигурно, он в конце концов попался.

src: Moscow maintains that such laws violate the rights of Russian-speaking people, who make up around half of Ukraine's population. Russian Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Maria Zakharova said in February that Kiev's "discriminatory campaign" against the language was growing more and more "indignant." In a survey conducted last September by the Kiev International Institute of Sociology, respondents cited language discrimination as the most common type of prejudice in Ukraine, with 45% saying it was a problem.
tgt: 莫斯科坚持认为，这些法律侵犯了俄语使用者的权利，俄语使用者约占乌克兰总人口的一半。俄罗斯外交部发言人玛丽亚·扎哈罗娃 (Maria Zakharova) 2 月表示，基辅针对俄语的“歧视运动”越来越“令人愤慨”。基辅国际社会学研究所去年 9 月进行的一项调查显示，受访者认为语言歧视是乌克兰最常见的偏见类型，45% 的人表示这是一个问题。

src: In an interview with Ventures Africa, an anonymous Senior Legal Official from a leading commercial bank commented, "There are several issues concerning this matter. First, her ministry is relatively new, and her predecessor and pioneering minister, Sadiya Umar-Farouk, engaged in activities that appeared to be illegal. It might be a reflection of how they operate in the ministry. Nevertheless, paying public money into private accounts goes against public procurement rules." He added that unless she can provide a valid reason for such approval, it may not necessarily involve fraudulent intent, but it is nonetheless incorrect, and certainty is lacking.
tgt: 一家领先商业银行的一位不愿透露姓名的高级法律官员在接受《非洲风险投资》采访时评论说：“这件事有几个问题。首先，她的部门相对较新，而她的前任部长萨迪亚·奥马尔-法鲁克从事了一些似乎是非法的活动。这可能反映了他们在部门的运作方式。然而，将公共资金存入私人账户违反了公共采购规则。”他补充说，除非她能为这种批准提供一个合理的理由，否则这可能不一定涉及欺诈意图，但这仍然是不正确的，而且缺乏确定性。

src: “All tanks were moving out” The commander started calmly but clearly into his headset. The engines of a platoon of tanks and Strykers roared to life as they started moving forward. The Kronos Cohren was on jolted as its break released and moved forward, getting into formation. The tanks took up a wedge formation as they moved across the Itania plains. The winter storms had frozen over the wetlands and forests, but the mud always remained.
tgt: “Todos los tanques se movían” El comandante empezó a hablar calmada pero claramente en su auricular. Los motores de una sección de tanques y Strykers rugieron al cobrar vida mientras empezaban a moverse hacia adelante. El Kronos Cohren se sacudió cuando se soltó el freno y se movió hacia adelante, formando una línea. Los tanques adoptaron una formación en cuña mientras se desplazaban a través de las llanuras de Itania. Las tormentas invernales habían congelado los humedales y bosques, pero el lodo siempre permanecía.

src: Running a business as a self-employed introverted creative and having a big heart for privacy shouldn't feel like a twist, but sometimes it is. The majority of online resources and coaches tell you to work with big (and evil) tech using extrovert techniques. Advertise here, follow the algorithm, share your personality. Get a blue tick on that service, be available 24/7, answer inquiries with a video of yourself, respond immediately. Video, video, video.
tgt: Dirigir un negocio como un creativo introvertido autónomo y tener un gran corazón por la privacidad no debería sentirse como algo extraño, pero a veces lo es. La mayoría de los recursos y entrenadores en línea te dicen que trabajes con grandes (y malvadas) empresas tecnológicas utilizando técnicas extrovertidas. Anuncia aquí, sigue el algoritmo, comparte tu personalidad. Consigue una marca de verificación azul en ese servicio, está disponible las 24 horas del día, los 7 días de la semana, responde las consultas con un video de ti mismo, responde inmediatamente. Video, video, video.

src: We're just going to let that sit and rehydrate for a couple of minutes. With ultralight cooking, we're not actually cooking on this dough. We're primarily boiling water so that we can rehydrate our food. It's also one of the reasons why we use instant grits. less cooking time, less fuel and less weight. Oh yeah. So this is about what we've got going on here. Perfect consistency.
tgt: Мы просто оставим её постоять и напитаться водой. Во время ультралегкой готовки мы практически не готовим на плите. В первую очередь мы кипятим воду, чтобы она могла восстановить влажность продукта. И поэтому мы используем гритс быстрого приготовления. Меньше времени готовки, меньше топлива, и меньше веса. О да. И вот примерно то, что у нас получается. Идеальная консистенция.

src: The company dispersed, joining together in their squads and their sergeants had them mount up on one of the tanks. Cohren pulled himself onto one of the tanks farther up on the convoy, joining Nemic, Craith, and two new recruits. Cohren remembered them arriving a few days ago, but didn’t know much about them. Sitting on the side, dangling his legs on the side, he adjusted his pack and radio set, which connected to his earpiece and throat mic.
tgt: 公司分散了，在队列和排长的带领下，他们都登上了其中的一辆坦克。科伦自己登上了另一辆坦克，加入了Nemic、Craith和两名新招募的士兵。科伦记得他们几天前刚到达，但对他们了解不多。坐在一边，悬着一条腿，他调整了他的包和对讲机，它连接到耳机和喉部麦克风。

src: Removing myself from clouded thoughts, I found my way to my favorite coffee spot; most people avoid it because rumors were spread that a lapse was found in the area, which was what society has referred to those whom the virus has infected. This never really disturbed me, I’ve had incredible luck my entire life, plus the owner is a great guy. Who would pass up free coffee in exchange for talks and chats late at night?
tgt: Después de alejarme de mis pensamientos nublados, encontré el camino hacia mi lugar favorito para tomar café; la mayoría de la gente lo evita porque se difundieron rumores de que se encontró una falla en la zona, lo cual es lo que la sociedad ha denominado a las personas infectadas por el virus. Esto nunca me molestó, he tenido una suerte increíble toda mi vida, además el propietario es un gran tipo. ¿Quién dejaría de tomar café gratis a cambio de conversaciones y charlas a altas horas de la noche?

src: Thassalin hissed, then circled round, closer to the mountain he called home. The dark beast followed, but somewhat panicked as a blast of fire hit it from behind. The creature hadn't realised it was no longer alone. It panicked further as Thassalin slowed down then thwacked his tail into the side of the beast's head, knocking it off course.
tgt: Тассалин зашипел, потом сделал круг, приближаясь к горе, которую называл домом. Тёмный зверь последовал за ним, но запаниковал, когда в него сзади ударил огненный шар. Существо не осознавало, что больше не было одно. Оно запаниковало ещё больше, когда Тассалин замедлился и ударил хвостом по голове зверя, сбивая его с курса.

src: No shit, I silently voiced to myself. Attempting to lockpick the chains that wrapped around his arms, voices closed in on our location, the faint footsteps growing ever louder. “Quick! Get back in the vent, and leave. Do not come back. If we meet again, it won’t be in this city.” He said hurriedly, the flash of panic on his face didn’t help my nerves at all. Listening to his advice. I couldn’t bring myself to stay longer. Fuck, Al. I quickly ran for it after exiting the vent; it hurt a bit to lose such an invaluable friend. Were they moving him to the…other city? So many things were flicking through my slightly scattered mind, and most of them were angry but sad. I’d done numerous kinds of research on the outer cities, and the capital of the infected, Alcatraz, which they named after the prison – felt like it fit the name pretty well from what I’d read. Not to mention the unmutated had cut any remaining connecting land with infected land, it was…tragic.
tgt: Sin mierda, me expresé silenciosamente a mí mismo. Intentando encerrar las cadenas que envuelven sus brazos, las voces se cierran en nuestra ubicación, los escalones débiles crecen cada vez más fuertes. ¡Quick! Retrocede en el respiradero y se marcha. No vuelva a aparecer. Si nos reunimos de nuevo, no ganamos en esta ciudad.” Él dijo apresuradamente, el destello de pánico en su rostro no ayudó a mis nervios en absoluto. Escuchar sus consejos. No podía traerme para quedarme más tiempo. Fuck, Al. I rápidamente se corrió por él después de salir del respiradero; se dañó un poco para perder a un amigo tan inestimable. ¿Se trasladan a la otra ciudad? Muchas cosas fueron golpeando a través de mi mente ligeramente dispersa, y la mayoría de ellas estaban enojadas pero tristes. Había hecho numerosos tipos de investigación sobre las ciudades exteriores, y la capital de la infectada, Alcatraz, a la que llamaron en honor de la prisión, se sintió como que encajaba el nombre bastante bien de lo que yo leí. Sin mencionar que los no mutados habían cortado cualquier tierra de conexión restante con la tierra infectada, era…tragic.

src: Affordable furniture DIYs are always a hit here on Lone Fox, so I wanted to share with you guys how I created this nightstand from a simple crate from IKEA. So this is the Nagle crate, which you can pick up for about $10 at IKEA. And I went ahead and I started off by just constructing it based off the instructions. You have to just screw all of the elements together. And once they are all screwed up, you have a basic wooden crate. Now on the bottom of the wooden crate, I wanted to add a leg, so I elevated it off the floor with these little wooden trinket dishes or like little wooden trays that I found at the craft store as well. They are just a simple wood, very similar to the one from IKEA, and I just e 6,000 these down. You could also use a nail gun if you'd like to. And once you are done, you have a very simple, minimal nightstand.
tgt: Дешевая мебель, сделанная своими руками, всегда пользуется популярностью здесь на Lone Fox, поэтому я решила поделиться с вами, как я создала эту тумбочку из простой коробки из IKEA. Это коробка Nagle, которую можно купить примерно за 10 долларов в IKEA. И я начала с того, что собрала ее по инструкции. Нужно просто собрать все элементы. И когда они все собраны, у вас есть простая деревянная коробка. Теперь на дне деревянной коробки я хотела добавить ножку, поэтому я подняла ее над полом с помощью этих маленьких деревянных подставок или маленьких деревянных подносов, которые я нашла в магазине для рукоделия. Они сделаны из простой древесины, очень похожей на древесину из IKEA, и я просто приклеила их. Вы также можете использовать пистолет для гвоздей, если хотите. И когда вы закончите, у вас будет очень простая, минималистичная тумбочка.

src: For most travelers, the aircraft model isn't a deciding factor when booking a flight. But with the majority of Boeing 737 MAX 9 jets grounded around the country after an Alaska Airlines fuselage blowout on Jan. 6, some prospective passengers may want to know how to tell what type of plane they'll be on and which models are the safest. The first is easy enough to answer - the second is a little more complicated.
tgt: 对于大多数旅行者来说，飞机型号在预订航班时并不是决定因素。但在1月6日阿拉斯加航空的一架波音737 MAX 9客机机身爆裂后，全国大多数波音737 MAX 9客机停飞，一些潜在乘客可能想知道如何判断自己将乘坐哪种类型的飞机，以及哪种型号的飞机最安全。第一个问题很容易回答——第二个问题稍微复杂一些。

Одна из причин, по которой машины скорой помощи не могут быстро доставить пациентов, заключается в том, что отделения неотложной помощи переполнены из-за переполненности палат.

src: The walk home was quiet, but so loud. The thoughts infecting my brain were booming, and the regret of not having stayed to help flashed over multiple times. I finally arrived home, almost brought to tears by the dreadful walk in the burst of sounds from the clouds above, the thunderous booms were enough to frighten any person sometimes. Dad was already passed out on the couch, some rerun of an older movie, probably 10-12 years old; sighing, I quietly crept my way back to my room. Flopping in the bed, I wasn’t able to keep my eyes open for long. Before long, slumber crept up on me.
tgt: Дорога домой была тихой, но такой громкой. Мысли, заполонившие мой мозг, бурлили, и сожаление о том, что я не остался, чтобы помочь, промелькнуло в моей голове несколько раз. Наконец я добрался домой, почти доведенный до слез этой ужасной прогулкой под грохот звуков, доносящихся из облаков над головой, - иногда громовых раскатов было достаточно, чтобы напугать любого человека. Папа уже отключился на диване, на каком-то повторе старого фильма, наверное, 10-12-летней давности; вздохнув, я тихонько прокрался обратно в свою комнату. Рухнув на кровать, я не смог долго держать глаза открытыми. Вскоре ко мне подкрался сон.
